clustering

类 Clustering

  • java.lang.Object
    • clustering.Clustering
  • 直接已知子类:
    DensityClustering, Hierarchical, MeansClustering, RandomWalks

    public abstract class Clustering
extends java.lang.Object
    The superclass of any clustering algorithm. It is able to compute the accuracy of the clustering algorithm with the external class information. It is abstract since clusterInK is not implemented.

    Author: Fan Min minfanphd@163.com, minfan@swpu.edu.cn
    Copyright: The source code and all documents are open and free. PLEASE keep this header while revising the program.
    Organization: Lab of Machine Learning, Southwest Petroleum University, Chengdu 610500, China.
    Project: The cost-sensitive active learning project.

    Progress: Almost finished, further revision is possible.
    Written time: July 20, 2019.
    Last modify time: July 21, 2019.

      • getSemiMaximalDistance

      • getSemiMaximalDistancePair

        Get a pair of instances with semi-maximal distance in a block.
        参数:

        返回:
        The point pair.

      • blockInformationToBlocks

        public int[][] blockInformationToBlocks(int[] paraBlockInformation,
                                        int paraK)
                                 throws LessBlocksThanRequiredException
        Block information (e.g., with 0, 1, 2) to blocks (e.g., 3 blocks).
        参数:
        paraBlockInformation - The block information.
        paraK - The number of blocks.
        返回:
        The blocks.
        抛出:
        LessBlocksThanRequiredException - If there is less blocks.

      • blockInformationToBlocks

        public static int[][] blockInformationToBlocks(int[] paraBlock,
                                               int[] paraBlockInformation,
                                               int paraK)
                                        throws LessBlocksThanRequiredException
        Block information (e.g., with 0, 1, 2) to k blocks. If there were more than paraK blocks, the top (paraK - 1) blocks will be the same, while the last block contains other instances.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        paraBlockInformation - The block partition information
        paraK - The final number of blocks.
        返回:
        The blocks.
        抛出:
        LessBlocksThanRequiredException - If no enough blocks.

      • clusterInK

        public abstract int[][] clusterInK(int[] paraBlock,
                                   int paraK)
                            throws UnableToClusterInKException
        Cluster into k blocks.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        paraK - The number of sub-blocks.
        返回:
        The sub-blocks.
        抛出:
        UnableToClusterInKException - If fails to cluster.

      • clusterInK

        public int[][] clusterInK(int paraK)
                   throws UnableToClusterInKException
        Cluster into k blocks using the whole block.
        参数:
        paraK - The number of sub-blocks.
        返回:
        The sub-blocks.
        抛出:
        UnableToClusterInKException - If fails to cluster.

        public int[][] clusterInTwo()
                     throws UnableToClusterInKException
        Cluster into 2 blocks.
        返回:
        The sub-blocks.
        抛出:
        UnableToClusterInKException - If fails to cluster.

        public int[][] clusterInTwo(int[] paraBlock)
                     throws UnableToClusterInKException

        返回:
        The sub-blocks.
        抛出:

      • clusterInTwo

        public int[][] clusterInTwo(int[] paraBlock,
                            int[] paraQueriedArray)
                     throws UnableToClusterInKException
        Cluster the given block in two using DBScan. Attention: should rewritten in the subclasses.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        paraQueriedArray - The queried instance within the block.
        返回:
        Two sub-blocks
        抛出:
        UnableToClusterInKException - If fails to cluster.

        参数:

        返回:
        the balance factor.

      • isBalanced

        public boolean isBalanced(int[][] paraBlocks)
        Is the blocks balanced?
        参数:
        paraBlocks - The given array with exactly 2 blocks.
        返回:
        True if balanced.

      • computeAccuracy

        public double computeAccuracy()
        Compute the accuracy of the clusters. Use external evaluator, i.e., the class information.
        返回:
        The accuracy.
